title: The role of expert associations in creation of open innovation ecosystems

author: Maja Brenčič Makovec, Ministrstvo za izobraževanje, znanost in šport Republike Slovenije

segmentation: Of course, the civil initiatives can take all kinds of forums and they can take all kinds of formats.

This is our main initiative right now because we are responsible.
To what we have already achieved in Slovenia but with a good values and good attitudes towards consumers.

Academic section is are supporting of course with the knowledge with.
I would say up-to-date views to what everything marketing is an bringing global knowledge also to to our local and regional issues, helping Slovenian firms to be responsible in marketing terms.
So thank you very late again.
It's really really a pleasure to share even this professional standpoints with you, and of course, as I said, we will support in Co. Further on very strongly.
Maya, thank you very much.
